Name: Swatcher
About the game: Swatcher is a color palette creation tool with a variety of features to streamline, organize and automate the process for you. Swatcher allows you to: Use a variety of options and settings to quickly generate different color harmonies and shades Rapidly design and organize your project's color schemes Ctrl+click any saved color to copy it's hex code to the clipboard Quickly convert between hex codes, rgb, hsv, and cmyk Save and load your color project in an easily-editable JSON file
Meta Title: Swatcher: Jan 13, 2017, Frozen Flame and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Swatcher? Check out the release date (Jan 13, 2017), developer insights from Frozen Flame, and a complete game summary.
